entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Ice fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
